tawshīt al-mīzān: law kān shawqī kīf ād‘ānī ād‘āk

column3: hal yā tará yas‘ad bk zmānī

tawshīt al-mīzān: idhā nshūf ḥay al-bar walā narāk

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. gharībat al-ḥusayn. tawshīḥ mujtathth li’aḥmad bn al-ḥusn al-mawṣilī

column3: ghayr shawqī ilayk mā lah ḥadd
fī mlāḥ al-zamān fī al-ḥusn fard
yā ḥabībī walam azal bik ahdū

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. gharībat al-ḥusayn. tawshīḥ lābin sahil
al-ṣan‘ah. gharībat al-ḥusayn. tawshīḥ mjzū’ al-khufayf

tawshīt al-mīzān: am kīf tadrī am kīf ta‘raf

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. ṣīkah. tawshīḥ mashṭūr al-raml lilṣṣafī al-ḥalī
al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. ṣīkah. tawshīḥ muqtaḍab lilmu‘tamid bn ‘ubbād
al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. gharībat al-ḥusayn. tawshīḥ muḍāri‘
al-ṣan‘ah. ṣīkah. qaṣīdah. basīṭ liqīs bn al-mulawwiḥ

tawshīt al-mīzān: al-lah ya‘lam ann al-rūḥ qad faniyat
wanaẓratun fīk yā s’lī wayā amalī
ashhá ilay min al-dunyā wamā fīhā
